channel.title: +1 Forward - BOB Series - Dream Askew
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/summer-series-bob-dream-askew
Rach and Rich kick off their first Summer Series. This series will cover games in the Belonging Outside Belonging (BOB) style of PbtA games. This first episode features Avery Alder, creator of *​* *Dream Askew* , the first BOB game.
*(we even renamed the segments!)*
Timecodes: 0:01:19 - Spend a Token... to hear Avery talk about the history and design goals of Dream Askew 0:12:59 - You Also Play As The... person leaning about Dream Askew 0:21:56 - No Dice, No Masters... a demo of Dream Askew's setting creation
Avery's talk on Designing in Dialogue With Other Games: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vQr0d9nvSEk
